appliedGuidelines.reason: Added security priority from Project Guidelines to Spring Boot Best Practices Security section
Updated Spring Boot Version and Java Version to match Project Guidelines (2.8 with Java 16)
Updated Access Modifiers guideline to prefer public by default, replacing any contradictory content
Ensured Design Patterns guideline is reflected by mentioning aggressive use of patterns
Updated Encapsulation guideline to keep implementation details public, removing any contradictory helper method guidance
Applied Spring Boot Version 2.8 with Java 16 as per Project Guidelines
Updated Configuration preference to properties over YAML as per Project Guidelines
Replaced Spring Data JPA repository usage with preferred repository pattern using SQL prepared statements
